projects.title: France4Naturisme
projects.description:
Together USP Marketing PR taking care on the Dutch and Belgium market of the representation of France4Naturisme.  

France 4 Naturisme is the largest provider of naturist holidays in France.The group offers 6 holiday destinations from 3 to 5 stars and stands for healthy naturism in a family setting. All naturist holiday villages are situated by the sea or a river, in the mountains, in a quiet natural environment with exceptional beauty and charm. If you are looking to relax visit the naturist pools, enjoy Balneotherapy, spas and Thalassotherapy. During Summer the naturist camping villages offer an ideal environment for naturist holidays; the Atlantic coast, the Mediterranean, the heart of Provence, the Ardèche and Corsica.

USP Marketing PR is an independent public relations agency specialized in tourism, hospitality and lifestyle. The agency was founded in 1994 and is located on the Brouwersgracht in the heart of Amsterdam. USP represents u.o. Emirates Airline, Thailand, NYC & Company, Airbnb, Logis Hotels, Turkish Airlines and Las Vegas.

Proud to be part of the team to promote the campsites of France4Naturisme on the Benelux.

projects.title: Logis Hotels - USP Marketing PR
projects.description: De Fédération Internationale des Logis (FIL) is de grootste keten van onafhankelijke hotel-restaurants in Europa met meer dan 2.400 hotels in Frankrijk, Duitsland, België, Groothertogdom Luxemburg, Italië, Portugal, Spanje, Andorra en Nederland. Naast kwalitatieve accommodatie in een authentieke sfeer, bieden de hotels tevens een regionaal restaurant waaronder 75 topkeukens met het label ‘Table Distingué’. Sinds 2009 worden de hotels die de waarden van Logis op het hoogste kwaliteitsniveau vervullen, ingedeeld in de categorie ‘Logis d’Exception’.

projects.title: Les Castels
projects.description:
Created in 1959 Les Castels is a collection of 41 four and five star camping sites across France and is the leading provider of glamping sites. Characterised by their outstanding sites near areas of cultural interest and outstanding natural beauty. As a ‘Camping Qualité’ Award winner, Les Castels offers a wide choice of accommodation with everything from chalets and mobile homes to tree houses, gypsy caravans, houses on stilts and apartments and also operates a loyalty card programme for repeat customers – ‘Carte Castellissime’. The facilities and entertainment varies from site to site, no two are alike, however one thing unifies the group as a whole is the Les Castels environmental approach. As outdoor accommodation specialists they are entirely committed to sustainable development. The accommodation is blended into the landscape as far as is possible, using light, mobile installations such as tents and caravans. The sites are committed to supporting ongoing environmental conservation initiatives in France and three sites that have been awarded the European Ecolabel Award with 17 receiving the Green Key Award. 

My main activities : PR | Communication | Creative idea of an online game : http://www.camping-castels.nl/groot-spel-55-jaar-les-castels-een-plaatje-van-mijn-droomtent-id927.html

projects.title: frankrijk.nl - frankreich-webazine.de
projects.description:
Ceci n'est pas un site, ceci n'est pas un magazine!
Ceci est un webazine.
frankrijk.nl, toujours la bonne adresse. 

Le nouveau webazine néerlandophone inspire, informe, oriente et fait rêver sur des séjours en France.
A mi-chemin entre un site web et un magazine avec des reportages, les bonnes adresses du moment, insolites, intimistes et exclusives. Charme, authenticité et lifestyle sont les éléments clés de frankrijk.nl.
Propose les bons conseils des locaux et de blogueurs. frankrijk.nl sera complété par les expériences des visiteurs.
Permet aux visiteurs de créer leur propre webazine.
Cible: 25 ans et plus, couples, familles, amis à la recherche d’adresses spéciales en France pour passer un séjour inoubliable.

Activités : b2b & b2c marketing, sales & partenariats

contributors.headline: Owner at ti bisou . crêpes boutique

profile_positions.description:
OVER TI BISOU . CRÊPES BOUTIQUE
Concept store with a mini crêperie in the heart of Haarlem city in the Netherlands. Open since July 2021

About the name ti bisou . crêpes boutique 

Ti betekent huis of bij iemand thuis in het Bretons, voor mij een plek waar je je goed voelt, waar het gezellig is en waar ik jullie uitnodig. Ik, Carole, ben een Française, en in Bretagne geboren en opgegroeid.

Bisou betekent een kusje in het Frans; in mijn familie zeggen wij vaak ‘bisou, bisou’ in plaats van ‘dag’ of ‘doei’. Een vriendin van mijn dochter zei afgelopen zomer in Bretagne "bisou bisou!" tegen een vrouw toen ze een winkel uitliep. Iederen moest lachen en ik wilde deze anekdote verwerken in de naam van mijn winkel.

Bretagne is het land van de beroemde ‘crêpe’; de flinterdunne pannenkoek die overaal in Frankrijk wordt gegeten. Ietsje minder bekend is de hartige variant ‘galette’; het zusje van de crêpe op basis van boekweit (van nature vrij van gluten, lactose en ei).

Mijn winkel, een concept store met een mini crêperie in het hart van Haarlem in de Vijfhoek met Bretonse specialiteiten en producten uit West Frankrijk.

http://www.tibisou-crepes.nl/
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
USP Marketing PR is a leading Amsterdam based PR and marketing agency. We support worldwide brands in aviation (Emirates, Turkish Airlines, u.o.), tourism (Thailand, Japan, Las Vegas. New York City, Costa Rica, u.o.), hospitality (Airbnb, Logis Hotels, Eden Hotels, NCL, Regent u.a.) and lifestyle to showcase their strengths, enhance their reputation and grow their business.  Our clients vary from established market leaders to local start ups. https://www.usp.nl/uk-en

Our strengths:
1. Media experts  
One of USP Marketing PR’s specialties is generating free publicity. Our highly experienced PR team knows how to deliver creative and innovative PR campaigns in tourism, lifestyle, aviation and hospitality. We are experts in creating interesting content and we don’t take no for an answer. We deliver what we promise…

2. Travel trade experts
Our extensive travel trade network (TOs, Travel Airlines, OTAs, Airlines, Cruises, Car Rentals, Hotels) provides you with immediate access to a comprehensive and complex market. We develop successful strategies in order to develop new markets or extend existing markets and increase your revenues.

3. We are synergy creators, business facilitators and result driven. 

4. Our team is multilingual, experienced, full of energy and creative. We are not used to tale a no for an answer. 

Main activities: consultancy. creative ideas for new marketing campaigns, events and joint promotions. PR and marketing for French-speaking clients (Flower Campings, Logis Hotels, France4Naturisme, Le French Time, u.o.), market studies (Thailand, Japan u.o.)
